str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am acted upon in a certain way, either good or bad; I experience ill treatment, suffer.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
Once, once for all. Probably from hapas; one time.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.
Gen: in behalf of; acc: above.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From pros and ago; to lead towards, i.e. to conduct near, or to approach.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To put to death, subdue; pass: To be in danger of death, be dead to, be rid of, be parted from. From thanatos to kill.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To make that which was dead to live, cause to live, quicken. From the same as zoon and poieo; tovitalize.
